_rate1.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 2.

_tbrk1.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate2.description: The second lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 3 and above tax bracket 2.

_tbrk2.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate3.description: The third tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 4.

_tbrk3.description: Taxable income below this threshold and above bracket 2 is taxed at tax rate 3.

_rate4.description: The fourth lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 5 and above tax bracket 3.

_tbrk4.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 3 is taxed at tax rate 4.

_rate5.description: The fifth lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below bracket 5 and above tax bracket 4.

_tbrk5.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 4 is taxed at tax rate 5.

_rate6.description: The sixth tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 7 and above tax bracket 5.

_tbrk6.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 5 is taxed at tax rate 6.

_rate7.description: The seventh tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 8 and above tax bracket 6.

_tbrk7.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 6 is taxed at tax rate 7.

_rate8.description: The eighth tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 9 and above tax bracket 7.

_tbrk8.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 7 is taxed at tax rate 8.

_rate9.description: The third highest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 10 and above tax bracket 8.

_tbrk9.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 8 is taxed at tax rate 9.

_rate10.description: The second highest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 11 and above tax bracket 9.

_tbrk10.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 9 is taxed at tax rate 10.

_rate11.description: The highest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income above tax bracket 11.

_tbrk11.description: Income above tax bracket 10 is taxed at tax rate 11.

_resico_rate1.long_name: Tax rate 1 for the simplified regime for incomes from business in PIT

_additional_dividend_rate.description: Dividend incomes are cumulated to the rest of incomes and taxed at the corresponding rate. An additional 10% is applied to the amount received from dividends

_capitalgains_bonds_rate.description: An specific tax rate is applicable to capital gains from the sale of shares in the stock exchange

_gambling_rate.long_name: Tax rate on incomes from gambling
_gambling_rate.description: Incomes from gambling are taxed at 1% for those states where the state taxes set rates below 6%, else is 21%

_temp_gambling_rate.description: Incomes from gambling are taxed at 1% for those states where the state taxes set rates below 6%, else is 21%

_rate1_curr_law.description: The lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 1.

_tbrk1_curr_law.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate2_curr_law.description: The second lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 3.

_tbrk2_curr_law.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 1.

_rate3_curr_law.description: The third lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 4.

_tbrk3_curr_law.description: Taxable income below this threshold is taxed at tax rate 3.

_rate4_curr_law.description: The second lowest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 2 and above tax bracket 1.

_tbrk4_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 1 is taxed at tax rate 2.

_rate5_curr_law.description: The fifth tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 6 and above tax bracket 4.

_tbrk5_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 4 is taxed at tax rate 5.

_rate6_curr_law.description: The sixth tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 7 and above tax bracket 5.

_tbrk6_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 5 is taxed at tax rate 6.

_rate7_curr_law.description: The seventh tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 8 and above tax bracket 6.

_tbrk7_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 1 is taxed at tax rate 2.

_rate8_curr_law.description: The eighth tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 9 and above tax bracket 7.

_tbrk8_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 7 is taxed at tax rate 8.

_rate9_curr_law.description: The third highest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 10 and above tax bracket 8.

_tbrk9_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 8 is taxed at tax rate 9.

_rate10_curr_law.description: The second highest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income below tax bracket 11 and above tax bracket 9.

_tbrk10_curr_law.description: Income below this threshold and above tax bracket 9 is taxed at tax rate 10.

_rate11_curr_law.description: The highest tax rate, applied to the portion of taxable income above tax bracket 10.

_tbrk11_curr_law.description: Income above bracket 10 is taxed at tax rate 11.
